name: Marriott International, Inc.
summary: Marriott International, Inc. is the world’s largest hotel company by number of rooms, operating, franchising, and licensing over 37 hotel and timeshare brands with more than 9,000 properties in 144 countries. Founded in 1927 and headquartered in Bethesda, Maryland, Marriott is publicly traded on NASDAQ and is recognized for its global hospitality leadership and innovation.
